text: Villa Beau Site. Villa Beau Site is a historic mansion in Nice, Alpes- Maritimes, France. It was built from 1885 to 1890, and it was designed by architect Sébastien-Marcel Biasini. It has been listed as an official national monument since July 27, 1987. ==References== Category:Houses completed in 1890 Category:Monuments historiques of Nice
title: Villa Beau Site
